eGroups is going through an insane time or something, so its screwing
over all the posts. Even posts posted from the message board are
coming as much as a day late.

::Havoc/Repressor::

"Allies," Havoc says. He glances at the pod. "Since you have this pod,
we'll be leaving."

With that, he lifts off, flying toward the Iron Fist. Repressor
follows behind.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., t882hcc91@y... wrote:
> Spy Streak:
> 
>      "The area is secured," Spy Streak said, noticing the faction 
> needed words on the screen of the pod. he leaned on the pod,
allowing 
> a cable to enter it from behind his claw arm, they wouldn't be able 
> to notice it if they were standing in front of him. He looked 
> completly casual as he downloaded the Destron programs into the new 
> bot. (If this is moding tell me and I'll change the post) He spoke
as 
> he did this, "There are more Destrons comming to make sure that this 
> area has no tresspasors. I am new here, please tell me, are you 
> allies of the Destrons? Or do I have to destroy you?"
>      This was just the way he acted around non-Destrons, he didn't 
> trust them unless Magmatron told him too, he was created a Destron 
> and will always be a Destron, for more reasons than just loyality.
